## ğŸ’¡ Pro Tips

1. **Consistency is key** - Respond to issues within 48 hours
2. **Quality over quantity** - One well-documented feature beats five poorly documented ones
3. **Engage authentically** - Share because you're proud, not just for stars
4. **Learn from feedback** - Users will suggest valuable improvements
5. **Celebrate milestones** - Share when you hit star counts, thank contributors
